context: what kind of movie would you like to watch?
I would like to watch something funny today! Can you recommend me best comedy ever? I really want to laugh out loud ! )
sure if you are looking for something that is a bit older I would check out Old School (2003) something newer Fist Fight (2017) was really funny
Yes, I've watched Old School (2003) . I liked it . I haven't seen Fist Fight (2017) . What this movie about ?
Can I watch Fist Fight (2017) with kids?
the teachers end up mad at each other. It depends how old the kids are.
Fist Fight (2017) t sounds really fun ! Can you recommend something else? I would like to have more options
for family friendly have you seen Inside Out (2015)
Or maybe something I can watch with a kid Inside Out (2015) is awesome ! My kid absolutely loved it. Her favorite movie is Up (2009) . Maybe you've seen this one
resp: I'm actually going to watch WALL-E (2008) in a little bit....another good one. Up (2009) was great!
